mapper.update: merge into hsp_czzl_inf a using (select #{emgNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR} emg_no, #{proCode, jdbcType = VARCHAR} pro_code, #{proVal, jdbcType = VARCHAR} pro_val from dual) b on (a.emg_no = b.emg_no and a.pro_code = b.pro_code) when matched then update set a.pro_val = b.pro_val, a.mod_user = #{modUser, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, a.mod_time = sysdate when not matched then insert (SEQ_NO, EMG_NO, PRO_CODE, PRO_VAL, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, MOD_TIME, MOD_USER) values (HSPCZZLINF_SEQ.nextval, b.emg_no, b.pro_code, b.pro_val, sysdate, #{crtUser, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{crtUser, jdbcType = VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select a.seq_no, a.emg_no, a.pro_code, a.pro_val, a.crt_time, a.crt_user, a.mod_time, a.mod_user from hsp_czzl_inf a where emg_no = #{emgSeq, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and pro_code in
#{item}

select a.pro_name, a.pro_type, a.pro_code, b.pro_val,a.pro_list,a.pro_unit from (select pro_name, pro_type, pro_code,pro_list,pro_unit from hsp_czzl_def where node_id = #{nodeId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and tit_flag = '1' order by fld_sort) a, (select pro_code, pro_val from hsp_czzl_inf where emg_no = #{emgSeq, jdbcType = VARCHAR}) b where a.pro_code = b.pro_code(+)

select a.emg_seq, a.emg_dat, a.cst_nam, a.cst_age, a.cst_sex_cod, a.oxy_nbr, b.sbpup_nbr, b.sbpdown_nbr, b.hrt_rte, a.id_nbr, a.phe_nbr, a.pre_dgn_cod, a.vst_cad, (select bed_num from hsp_bed_inf where emg_seq = a.emg_seq) bed_num from hsp_emg_inf a, hsp_mews_inf b where a.emg_seq = b.emg_seq(+) and a.czlcflg = '1'
and (a.vst_cad = #{cstNam, jdbcType = VARCHAR} or a.cst_nam like '%'||#{cstNam, jdbcType = VARCHAR}||'%' )
and a.emg_dat >= sysdate - 1
order by emg_dat desc

select inf.seq_no, inf.emg_no, inf.pro_code, inf.pro_val, def.pro_type, def.pro_name, def.key_time from hsp_czzl_inf inf, hsp_czzl_def def where inf.pro_code = def.pro_code and inf.emg_no = #{emgSeq, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and def.pro_type = 'time2' and def.key_time in ('1','2') and inf.pro_val is not null order by inf.pro_val asc, def.fld_sort asc

select count(1) from hsp_dbzl_bas a where a.PAT_TYP = '2'
and a.cst_nam like '%'||#{cstNam, jdbcType = VARCHAR}||'%'
and exists (select 1 from hsp_czzl_inf where hsp_czzl_inf.emg_no = a.emg_seq and hsp_czzl_inf.pro_code = 'CBZD' and hsp_czzl_inf.pro_val = #{zd, jdbcType = VARCHAR})
and exists (select 1 from hsp_czzl_inf where hsp_czzl_inf.emg_no = a.emg_seq and hsp_czzl_inf.pro_code = 'ZDYS' and hsp_czzl_inf.pro_val like '%'||#{zdys, jdbcType = VARCHAR}||'%')
and a.crt_tim > #{startDate, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} and a.crt_tim < #{endDate, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}

select emg.emg_seq emgSeq, emg.cst_nam cstNam, (case when emg.cst_age_cod = '0' then emg.cst_age else '0' end) cstAge, emg.emg_dat emgDat, hlpgb.clbz_cod, emg.patid, (select consultation_date from (select consultation_date, invitation_date from hsp_consultation_records where emg_seq_cr = #{emgSeq, jdbcType = VARCHAR} and invitation_dep like '%神经内科%' order by invitation_date) where rownum = 1) consultationDate from hsp_emg_inf emg, hsp_hlpgb hlpgb where emg.emg_seq = hlpgb.emg_seq(+) and emg.emg_seq = #{emgSeq, jdbcType = VARCHAR}

select a.emg_seq, a.reg_tim, a.cst_nam, a.cst_age, a.cst_sex_cod, (select pro_val FROM hsp_czzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'XUEYANG') xueyang, (select pro_val FROM hsp_czzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'XUEY') xuey, (select pro_val FROM hsp_czzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'XINL') xinl, a.id_nbr, a.phe_nbr, (select pro_val FROM hsp_czzl_inf WHERE emg_no = a.emg_seq and pro_code = 'CBYX') cbyx, a.vst_cad, (select bed_num from hsp_bed_inf where emg_seq = a.emg_seq) bed_num from HSP_DBZL_BAS a where a.pat_typ = '2'
and (a.vst_cad = #{cstNam, jdbcType = VARCHAR} or a.cst_nam like '%'||#{cstNam, jdbcType = VARCHAR}||'%' )
and a.reg_tim >= sysdate - 1
order by reg_tim desc

select count(*) from hsp_dbzl_bas a where a.pat_typ = '2'
and (a.vst_cad = #{cstNam, jdbcType = VARCHAR} or a.cst_nam like '%'||#{cstNam, jdbcType = VARCHAR}||'%' )
and a.crt_tim >= sysdate - 1
order by reg_tim desc nulls last
